product_name: The North Face RDT Rain Jacket - Women's
long_description: Enhanced breathability and durable waterproofing make the lightweight North Face RDT Rain jacket a winning choice for a shell you can take anywhere without feeling weighed down. FlashDry(TM) technology aids breathability and speeds drying time by moving moisture to the outside of the material for rapid evaporation. HyVent(R) 2.5L nylon provides waterproof, windproof protection while remaining breathable and lightweight, perfect for traveling or backpacking. Watertight polyurethane-coated front zipper and sealed seams ensure water never leaks through otherwise vulnerable areas. Attached, adjustable hood offers full-coverage protection; underarm zippers allow venting. 2 zippered front pockets secure small essentials; jacket can be packed down and stored in left-hand pocket. The North Face RDT rain jacket for women features adjustable cuffs and hem cinch cord for a snug fit that seals in warmth.
short_description: Enhanced breathability and durable waterproofing make the lightweight North Face RDT Rain jacket a winning choice for a shell you can take anywhere without feeling weighed down.
